tagline: Java based program for getting a local&global ip adresses
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: GetIP
body:
### Welcome to GetIP project pages.
This program was created in some way just for fun, but it become interesting for me to do some revival of this thing. 

### Ideas and dev
In case if You some ideas for further development or upgrade of GetIP it would be interesting for me to hear them all, so don't hesitate to contact me. 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with GetIP? Contact me at kristian.makara@gmail.com and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out.
